text: Hồ Ngọc Hà (born 25 November, 1984)Tướng mạo giúp Hồ Ngọc Hà thành danh nhưng tình duyên lận đận?Nghẹn ngào lời chúc sinh nhật Hồ Ngọc Hà của nhà văn Nguyễn Quang Vinh is a Vietnamese singer, model and actress. She became famous when she won 1st prize of super model contest of Vietnam in 2003 and 2004, then she turned to act as singer. == Biography == Hồ Ngọc Hà was born in Đồng Hới city, Quảng Bình province to a banking family. Her grandfather was of French descent. She studied piano at Military College of Arts . She is now living in Ho Chi Minh City. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Vietnamese musicians Category:Quảng Bình province Category:Singers
title: Hồ Ngọc Hà
